byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The venture capital firm is pitching its fund as a friendly way for entrepreneurs to raise early capital while allowing it to make smaller investments.

headline.main: Kleiner Perkins to Write Smaller Checks With $4 Million Fund

snippet: The venture capital firm is pitching its fund as a friendly way for entrepreneurs to raise early capital while allowing it to make smaller investments.
